Taunton.Alfred Paull House:
The Alfred Paull House is a historic house located at 467 Weir Street in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
It is a two-story, wood-framed structure, roughly square in shape, with a tall bell-cast mansard roof. A porch extends across the front and around to one side, with chamfered posts and a decorative valance with curved pendant brackets.
